short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you watch YouTube video cards with sound on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch YouTube videos from their inline preview cards now with the sound turned on. YouTube will forcibly mute the videos played within their cards, and pressing the keyboard shortcut [m] doesn't work as they're constantly muted.

This extension, when installed and enabled, will force those videos to be played with audible (100%) sound.
